title: Maximising Back/Forward Cache hit-rate
summary: [BFCache](https://web.dev/bfcache) provides a big performance win for navigation but there are obstacles to pages successfully being cached - Cache-Control: no-store header, unload handlers, in-the-wild telemetry for cache misses. This covers proposals for solving these.
goals: Get feedback on proposals for [unload](https://github.com/w3c/webappsec-permissions-policy/issues/444), [Cache-control: no-store](https://github.com/fergald/explainer-bfcache-ccns/) and [not-restored reasons](https://github.com/rubberyuzu/bfcache-not-retored-reason/blob/main/NotRestoredReason.md) and any other ideas to improve hit-rate.
